extendedInfo.description: Are you a health conscious person? Then this is the right App for you.Do you know what your ideal weight range is or do you know in which weight category you have? And any idea about how many calories you should take in to maintain your weight? Well, This app will answer your questions.This is the most simplest BMI Calculator and Ideal Weight Calculator which calculates you BMI, find out the ideal weight range and also gives you calorie intake count(TDEE) you should not exceed to maintain your weight.This app also RECORDS your data and present it in form of GRAPHs.  All calculations are based on your weight, height, age, gender and activity level.Supports:- Android â Donut to Jelly Bean- Screens - Small to X-LargeFeatures:- Weight  in kg/ lb- Height in inch/ cm/ Feet + Inch- Easy way to input height and weight values- Real time BMI, Ideal Weight and TDEE values- Records weight, BMI, TDEE on saved date - Plot graph of above data- Date change facility - For  everyone above 20Info:BMI â Body Mass Index is a measure for human body shape based on an individual's weight and height. The BMI does not actually measure the percentage of body fat.Ideal weight range is based on weight and height.TDEE â Total Daily Energy Expenditure is the total number of calories that your body expends in 24 hours, including all activities. TDEE is also known as your "maintenance level". TDEE gives you calories demanded by your body to maintain the current weight.Please feel free to give your feedback to improve the appYou can also send your feedback to curiouscreator23@gmail.com(*Aligned with WHO guidelines)

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: I have used various apps related to bmi and weight, what is great about this app is its clean graphics, ease of use and all the necessary tools that help you track and record your weight, bmi and tdee.  Thanks!
reviews.author: Saumil Mevada

reviews.comment: Its the one what I need
reviews.author: Mohamed Muzammil
